title: STEPHEN HARPER REITERATES HE WILL BOYCOTT SRI LANKA COMMONWEALTH SUMMIT
content: By Walter Jayawardhana Prime Minister Stephen Harper reiterated  January 18 he will be boycotting the Commonwealth heads of meeting to be held in Sri Lanka, the OMNI TV reported. Prime Minister Stephen Harper is set to boycott the 2013 Commonwealth summit in Sri Lanka if the island state’s government does not improve human rights, according…
